text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I can hear it, I hear it…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The voices awaiting the arrival of the most exemplary of honor students!!
choice_data_list: Go out there and give it your best shot!
Go out there and give it your best shot!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Leave・it・to・me!!! The in-perfect-form class president is here!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I shall pledge! I, the class president――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In accordance with the Uma Musume Ship, fair! Square! I pledge to be an exemplary Bakushin of the greatest degree!!
